item.description: Join us for a fun hike at Purgatory Chasm! I haven't been here since I was a kid and have been meaning to go back. There are a bunch of short trails (one of which goes through the chasm) in lengths from half a mile to a couple of miles so we'll do a couple of them. It is a chasm, so definitely some rocky terrain so we should get a good work out. We'll meet at the visitor center. Probably should only be a couple of hours so we'll be home in time for football. Here is the website if you want to know more: http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the bright yellow escape or call my cell 508 414 8544.
item.name: Hike Purgatory Chasm
